parsed_text.response: In Zita, you can filter job candidates using the platform's robust search and filtering tools within the 'Candidate Management' section. Here, you can apply filters based on criteria such as skills, experience, education, and screening status to narrow down the list of potential candidates efficiently.

To share job listings on social media via Zita, navigate to the job listing you want to share within the 'Career Page' or 'Job Management' section. Look for the social media sharing icons associated with each job listing, such as Facebook, Twitter, or LinkedIn. Click on the icon for the platform where you want to share the job, and follow the prompts to post directly to your social media account

To handle applications received through Zita, navigate to the 'Candidate Management' or 'Applications' section of your dashboard. Here, you can review each application, sort and filter candidates based on various criteria, and move them through different stages of your recruitment pipeline.

To use templates for job postings on Zita, navigate to the 'Job Creation & Posting' section of your account. Here, you can access a library of pre-designed job description templates. Select a template that suits your needs, and it will automatically populate the job creation form with relevant details, which you can then customize as needed

To save a job as a draft on Zita, begin creating your job post in the 'Job Posting' section. As you fill out the details, look for an option or button labeled 'Save as Draft.' Clicking this will save your current progress without making the job post live, allowing you to return and complete it at a later time
suggestions: Creating a Job Post in Zita

parsed_text.response: To renew a subscription on Zita, access 'Settings' then click on 'Manage Subscription'. Choose your desired plan and payment term, enter your payment details, and click 'Subscribe' to complete the process.

To navigate the applicant process on Zita, start by uploading your resume on the career page, which will be auto-filled into the personal information form for review. After verifying your identity with a code sent to your email, you can proceed to apply. Finally, submit the application form and monitor your application status via the candidate dashboard

When you cancel a subscription on Zita, you retain access to your data until the end of the current subscription period. After this period, your access to the data is suspended, but you can renew your subscription later to regain access

To apply for a job on Zita, visit the Careers Page and click 'Apply' on a desired job. Create a company profile if new, or use an existing profile. Upload your resume, which Zita's AI will auto-fill into a personal information form for accuracy verification. Confirm your identity, review and edit auto-filled details, then proceed to apply and submit your application form.

To track the status of your job applications on Zita, use your candidate dashboard. Once you've completed the application process, you can log in with your credentials and navigate to the dashboard where the status of all applied jobs is displayed.

To send messages to candidates through Zita, navigate to the 'Zita Match Candidates' page and click on a candidate's name to open their profile. Then, go to the 'Communication' tab, type your message, and click 'Send' to dispatch your message directly to the candidate.

Zita facilitates direct communication with applicants through its platform by enabling email and chat features. This allows recruiters to engage with candidates in real-time, schedule interviews, and provide updates on their application status directly within the system.

Zita's 'Invite to Apply' feature allows you to proactively reach out to potential candidates, enhancing your recruitment efforts. To use it effectively, ensure that job postings are clear and compelling, and that you tailor invitations to match candidates' skills and experience.
